_description: Verses urging reader to know thyself — 44 lines in eight-line stanzas with refrain, ‘And know thyself wysely I rede’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
…Therefore be thyn own frendThynke what þou art in lenth
                    & brede…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Therfor I rede þat thow yt lere& hevyn blis shall be
                    your mede
OxfBal354.Attributed Title: Explicit Know thi self wysely I red (p. 334)
